price: 113. Waxaana u yimid Rasuul ka mid ah, wayse beeniyeen, markaasaa waxaa ku dhacay Cadaab iyagoo ahaa daalimiin.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ جَآءَهُمۡ رَسُولٞ مِّنۡهُمۡ فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَخَذَهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابُ وَهُمۡ ظَٰلِمُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walaqad jāahum rasūlun min'hum fakadhabūhu fa-akhadhahumu al-ʿadhābu wahum ẓālimūna
